name: beam sword controls
description: The activation controls for a Rivtech beam sword.

name: beam sword power cell
description: A heavy power cell used to ignite a Rivtech beam sword.

name: beam sword portal conductor
description: The portal field conductor used in a Rivtech beam sword.

name: beam sword vortex ring
description: An extremely delicate yet complex set of interlocking cogs used to help power a Rivtech beam sword.

name: beam sword power insulator
description: A ceramic power shielding unit from a Rivtech beam sword.

name: beam sword energy gate
description: A light absorbing case of shimmering, slow moving liquid used to guide power in Rivtech beam sword.

name: beam sword recharge socket
description: Power connection ports to be installed in a Rivtech beam sword.

name: beam sword focusing chamber
description: A focusing chamber for the blade on a Rivtech beam sword.

name: beam sword blade energy channel
description: The energy channel the portal beam passes through on a Rivtech beam sword.

name: beam sword cycling field energizer
description: The field energizer that keeps the blade ignited on a Rivtech beam sword.

name: beam sword energy modulation circuit
description: An energy modulation circuit for the blade on a Rivtech beam sword.

name: beam sword focusing lens
description: A lens to help ignite and then focus the blade emitted from a Rivtech beam sword.

name: beam sword emitter matrix
description: A highly dangerous component of a Rivtech beam sword used to keep the blade from igniting the atmosphere.

name: beam sword high energy flux aperture
description: A series of ever-looping circuity from a Rivtech beam sword that hurts your eyes to try and trace.
